levels.description:
Deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> ground enemies in front, and cause targets with 3 or less Weight to <$ba.levitate>Levitate </><@ba.vup>{levitate}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can store 2 charges</>
